resources.string: E-Zakat Calculator is a Mobile Application that used to estimate zakat payment for gold keeping. The application will calculate the total value of the gold, total gold value that is zakat payable, and the total zakat.
1. Azizah Binti Mohamad Imran. Student ID is 2021172575. From group RCS2405B
